data.title: 26th Annual Academy Awards Nominations (1954)
data.meta_description: Nominations list for the 26th Academy Awards
data.text:
©A.M.P.A.S.®

Date of Ceremony: Thursday, March 25, 1954

For films released in: 1953

26th Overview

Results & Commentary

Other years:

< 25th

27th >

Here is a complete list of nominations for the 26th Annual Academy Awards.

And the nominees are:

Buddy Adler

John Houseman

Shane

George Stevens
